actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law

official_title: To amend chapter 3 of title 11, United States Code, to modify the compensation for private bankruptcy trustees; and for other purposes.
short_title: Bankruptcy Trustee Compensation Improvement Amendments of 1991

summary.text: Bankruptcy Trustee Compensation Improvement Amendments of 1991- Amends the Federal bankruptcy code to revise the compensation formula for private bankruptcy trustees. Increases from $20 to $45 the statutory fee for trustee services.

titles.title: Bankruptcy Trustee Compensation Improvement Amendments of 1991
To amend chapter 3 of title 11, United States Code, to modify the compensation for private bankruptcy trustees; and for other purposes.
